amendment.description: To extend the special rules for the child tax credit that applied for 2021 and to increase the corporate tax rate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5208 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 1 - 97. Record Vote Number: 308.

action.text: Amendment SA 5208 proposed by Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 5194. (consideration: CR S4187-4190; text: CR S4187-4189) To extend the special rules for the child tax credit that applied for 2021 and to increase the corporate tax rate.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5208 proposed by Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 5194.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 5208 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 1 - 97. Record Vote Number: 308.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 5208 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 1 - 97. Record Vote Number: 308.
